description:
Neither of these two can seem to communicate their true feelings! Will Wataru and Aika ever see eye to eye?
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Douzo. Spare no Sankaku Choco Pie Desu
For You. It`s a Spare Triangle Chocolate Pie
Tessék, van nálam pluszban egy szelet csokis pite
どうぞ. スペアの三角チョコパイです
